response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a remarkable product that I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. This product, valued at $800,000 to you, holds an even greater significance to me, as it represents a considerable investment and contribution to my business. Considering its true worth and the value it brings to you, I am offering it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. I am confident this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 1200000}
